Free Cyber Security Training

A curated list of free cybersecurity training platforms and resources. This is not a comprehensive list, but includes many excellent resources for those starting their cybersecurity journey.

TryHackMe

Interactive cybersecurity training platform with hands-on labs covering penetration testing, security operations, and more.

Visit Website
Hack The Box

Platform for penetration testing training with realistic vulnerable machines and capture the flag challenges.

Visit Website
OverTheWire

Wargames that help you learn and practice security concepts through fun challenges and games.

Visit Website
UnderTheWire

Wargames that help you learn and practice PowerShell and security concepts through fun challenges and games.

Visit Website
picoCTF

Free computer security education program with year-round practice challenges for students and beginners.

Visit Website
Cybrary

Offers free cybersecurity courses covering various topics from beginner to advanced levels.

Visit Website
LetsDefend

Blue team training platform with hands-on SOC analyst experience and incident response scenarios.

Visit Website
PortSwigger Web Security Academy

Free online training from the creators of Burp Suite, covering web security vulnerabilities and exploitation.

Visit Website
OWASP

Open Web Application Security Project with free resources, tools, and documentation for application security.

Visit Website
HackerOne

Bug bounty platform with a training site where you can practice vulnerability research on real programs and earn rewards.

Visit Website
Bugcrowd

Crowdsourced security platform offering bug bounty programs and security testing opportunities. Has a training site as well.

Visit Website
Intigriti

European bug bounty and security platform connecting ethical hackers with companies and providing training for people trying to get into bug bounty.

Visit Website
YesWeHack

European bug bounty platform and vulnerability coordination platform for ethical hackers. YesWeHack Dojo provides training opportunities for bug hunters.

Visit Website
HackTricks

Comprehensive wiki with penetration testing techniques, methodologies, and security knowledge.

Visit Website
0xdf Hacks Stuff

Detailed walkthroughs and write-ups for HackTheBox machines and CTF challenges.

Visit Website
Cisco Networking Academy

Free networking and cybersecurity courses from Cisco, including cybersecurity essentials.

Visit Website
Microsoft Learn

Free learning platform with cybersecurity training paths and Azure security content.

Visit Website
Antisyphon Training

Pay-What-You-Can security training with live instruction from industry professionals.

Visit Website
TCM Security Academy

Practical penetration testing and security training with hands-on courses that is affordable.

Visit Website
Simply Cyber

Cybersecurity career guidance, training resources, and community support for beginners.

Visit Website
Build Cyber

Resources and guidance for building a career in cybersecurity with practical advice. Includes vouchers for individuals in need to receive free training courses including, Hack the Box certifications, the Offsec OSCP, and many more.

Visit Website
Hack Smarter

Security training and resources focused on practical hacking skills and career development.

Visit Website
Executive Offense

Advanced offensive security training and resources for security professionals.

Visit Website
Red Team Leaders

Resources for red team professionals and offensive security practitioners. Contains detailed, technical content and most of the courses are free. Certifications are offered as well and most cost under $20.

Visit Website
Hacking Hub

Security training platform with hands-on labs and cybersecurity challenges.

Visit Website
Pentest-Ground

A free playground with deployed vulnerable web applications and network services.

Visit Website
Websploit Labs

A collection of vulnerable docker containers assembled by Omar Santos containing several labs including, OWASP Juice Shop and DVWA(Damn Vulnerable Web App).

Visit Website
My Blog
